messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Getting old; getting the point...
messages.msgSnippet: From: debi watson   Maybe that s why I hate it so much,
messages.messageBody:
From: debi watson <debiwatson@...>

<<I saw on a bumper sticker today: "Growing up is optional; growing older
isn't".>>


Maybe that's why I hate it so much, I have no choice in the matter!! You
know, the whole power struggle thing??!!


<<(Also, "He who laughs last thinks slowest" -- but that is the topic for a
whole 'nother post)>>


That sounds like my mom!!!! She takes all the fun out of telling her a joke.
Especially if it's dirty. No fun when you have to explain them
afterwards!!!!!

Mary B

messages.messageBody:
I saw on a bumper sticker today: "Growing up is optional; growing older isn't". (Also, "He who laughs last thinks slowest" -- but that is the topic for a whole 'nother post) Debi
>> I have this thing about getting old!

>Yes, but consider the alternative! <bg>
